Package gladosPackage

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNeuron
    A class that represents a neuron, the fact that it is abstract allows for more flexibility in any NeuralNetwork.
    ImageDisplayPanel
    A JPanel which automatically displays one of the MNIST images, depending on its constructor, either by finding the image associated with an image number or by creating the image from a byte array.
    InputNeuron
    The simples of all AbstractNeurons it simply transmits the input to the output.
    IntermediateNeuron
    The most versatile AbstractNeuron, it is made to be part of the hidden layers and thus have both an inputNeuron layer and an outputNeuron layer
    LearningWindow
    This visual window is executable and allows the training of a new NeuralNetwork from scratch and following a number of parameters.
    NeuralNetwork
    A feed forward neural network which consists of an input layer, an output layer and at least one hidden layer.
    OutputNeuron
    An output neuron for a neural network.
    Preprocessing
    This class is build entirely to save the preprocessed images as a List of SourceImage
    SourceImage
    This class is used to extract relevant features from the byte array given to the constructor
    TestingWindow
    This class is a window which allows the test of neural networks when recognizing written characters.
